mapper.select: select *,ST_Distance_Sphere(center, GeomFromText('POINT(${lng} ${lat})')) as distance from biz_business where state=1 and `delete`=1 and `type`=#{type} order by ST_Distance_Sphere(center, GeomFromText('POINT(${lng} ${lat})')) desc LIMIT #{page} , #{psize};
select * from basic_picture p join biz_business_picture rp on rp.business_id=#{id} and rp.picture_id=p.id
